description: black and white image of boy with dark hair wearing a T-shirt with cut-off arms with snake and clenched fist drawn on it, with his hands on his hips, at left; shadow of boy at right on top of a mural of a hand
markings: verso LRC stamped in black and in pencil: Printer / K / BLEAK BEAUTY / 75 / Picture Date / 14 / Print Date
signed: verso LRC in pencil: Danny Lyon
title: Untitled (boy and shadow), from "What Hopes Have Perished with you My Son", In Memory of Johnnie Sanches (1960-1983), Our Lady of Sorrows Cemetary, Bernalillo, New Mexico
